# 前端基础

![image-20200226094829157](img/image-20200226094829157.png)

![image-20200226094922754](img/image-20200226094922754.png)

**list-style-type:**

![image-20200226095001402](img/image-20200226095001402.png)

**list-style-postion:**

| 值      | 描述     |
| ------- | -------- |
| inside  | 向右缩进 |
| outside | 向左突出 |

**奇偶选择器：**

:nth-child(odd|even)
